MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA17 and ML10 postcode areas of Darvel and Strathaven. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6PM to safely carry out repairs on our overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:12 PM on Tuesday, 23 February 2021
